医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家开发出用纳米材料“纹身”活细胞的新技术目前，半机械人只存在于小说中，但随着科学的进步，这个概念变得越来越合理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-develop-new-technique-to-tattoo-living-cells-with-nanomaterials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-develop-new-technique-to-tattoo-living-cells-with-nanomaterials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=598fbb47-950b-4d5b-929f-4746879cc3df Thu, 10 Aug 2023 22:12:33 -0400 Scientists develop new technique to "tattoo" living cells with nanomaterials
新研究扩展了对 COVID-19 后状况的了解根据迄今为止对一年多症状表现的最全面研究，长期新冠病毒在急性疾病过去后可能会持续至少一年，或者在几个月后出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-study-expands-knowledge-of-post-COVID-19-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-study-expands-knowledge-of-post-COVID-19-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=812f6488-26a5-48a5-918b-22903d517342 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 22:09:42 -0400 New study expands knowledge of post-COVID-19 conditions
新的基因编辑工具有助于研究癌症中的单碱基突变构成致癌基因的代码中的一个字母的改变就可以显着影响肿瘤的侵袭性或癌症患者对特定治疗的反应程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-gene-editing-tool-helps-to-study-single-base-mutations-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-gene-editing-tool-helps-to-study-single-base-mutations-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af8ad06b-6bab-4e9f-8d84-0fe03768b898 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 21:53:04 -0400 New gene-editing tool helps to study single-base mutations in cancer
科学家开发出“通用泛哺乳动物时钟”以准确估计哺乳动物的年龄加州大学洛杉矶分校大卫格芬医学院和加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的科学家领导了一个国际研究小组，发表了两篇详细介绍 DNA 变化的文章——研究人员发现，人类和其他哺乳动物在整个历史上都有这种变化，并且与寿命和许多其他特征有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-develop-universal-pan-mammalian-clock-to-accurately-estimate-age-in-mammals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-develop-universal-pan-mammalian-clock-to-accurately-estimate-age-in-mammals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21b71faf-c79b-418c-8cec-32ac231112a6 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 21:43:54 -0400 Scientists develop "universal pan-mammalian clock" to accurately estimate age in mammals
从拉丁美洲吸取的经验教训可以帮助爱尔兰了解健康的大脑老化都柏林三一学院的研究人员研究了影响拉丁美洲和加勒比地区 (LAC) 国家大脑健康老化的因素，并发现在那里学到的经验教训也可以应用于家庭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Lessons-learned-from-Latin-America-can-help-Ireland-understand-healthy-brain-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Lessons-learned-from-Latin-America-can-help-Ireland-understand-healthy-brain-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cde535c0-a383-4d6a-8c2a-5b02922614cf Thu, 10 Aug 2023 21:35:47 -0400 Lessons learned from Latin America can help Ireland understand healthy brain aging
美国国立卫生研究院资助的研究重点是酗酒对年轻人的第二天影响恶心、头痛和注意力不集中等宿醉症状可能会困扰过量饮酒的年轻人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/NIH-funded-study-focuses-on-next-day-effects-of-heavy-drinking-on-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/NIH-funded-study-focuses-on-next-day-effects-of-heavy-drinking-on-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b57c7fc-bdbb-4a23-8ac0-d5e2984ebaf7 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 15:50:04 -0400 NIH-funded study focuses on next-day effects of heavy drinking on young adults
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：在堕胎权方面，俄亥俄州是新的堪萨斯州俄亥俄州的选民——在一次罕见的八月选举中——投票率出人意料地高，否决了一项投票措施，该措施将使堕胎权宪法修正案在 1​​1 月的投票中更难通过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-On-abortion-rights-Ohio-is-the-new-Kansas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-On-abortion-rights-Ohio-is-the-new-Kansas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94b75cdf-0783-493f-bbb5-4c6e7ae44784 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 15:44:51 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': On abortion rights, Ohio is the new Kansas
莱斯大学化学家获得 NIH 100 万美元拨款以解决癌症健康差异莱斯大学化学家卡罗琳·尼科尔 (Carolyn Nichol) 荣获美国国立卫生研究院颁发的具有竞争力的科学教育合作奖 (SEPA)，旨在通过增加代表性不足的少数族裔学生群体对生物科学教育的参与来解决基于种族的癌症健康差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Rice-University-chemist-wins-241M-NIH-grant-to-address-cancer-health-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Rice-University-chemist-wins-241M-NIH-grant-to-address-cancer-health-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb43fd8a-827f-44b8-b791-1c1cab54d1ad Thu, 10 Aug 2023 15:38:16 -0400 Rice University chemist wins $1M NIH grant to address cancer health disparities
由红细胞制成的微小颗粒可以治疗动脉粥样硬化和其他疾病动脉粥样硬化是一种脂肪、胆固醇和其他物质在动脉壁内积聚的疾病。这会导致斑块形成，从而阻塞动脉并导致心脏病和中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Tiny-articles-made-from-red-blood-cells-may-treat-atherosclerosis-and-other-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Tiny-articles-made-from-red-blood-cells-may-treat-atherosclerosis-and-other-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b9fc846-cc19-464d-b428-34604ec90b85 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 15:29:27 -0400 Tiny particles made from red blood cells may treat atherosclerosis and other diseases
Good Trials Prism：加强资源匮乏环境下临床研究的新合作伙伴关系位于资源匮乏地区的四个主要临床试验网络正在与良好临床试验合作组织建立令人兴奋的合作伙伴关系，以加强资源匮乏地区的临床研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Good-Trials-Prism-A-new-partnership-to-enhance-clinical-research-in-low-resource-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Good-Trials-Prism-A-new-partnership-to-enhance-clinical-research-in-low-resource-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aea608f6-af44-4c2e-93e4-6ca722f62341 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 15:09:57 -0400 Good Trials Prism: A new partnership to enhance clinical research in low resource settings
